channel.title: Tweets on ggtree
channel.description: Recent content in Tweets on ggtree

item.title: Tweets
item.description: Leave me a message on The ggtree package looks like a cool way to visualize hierarchical datahttps://t.co/spsqLkqeVG pic.twitter.com/GRODlrBahW — lobrowR (@lobrowR) August 21, 2017 New ggtree-based visualization in R package phylofactor! Below are the top three factors (= 4 bins) of mammalian body mass. pic.twitter.com/ruT4OZF7gW — Alex Washburne (@alex_washburne) August 19, 2017 Possible to combine #ggjoy with #ggtree ? My gg-fu is weak. #rstats #DataViz #JoyPlot https://t.co/4FICfER6Oa — Libby Megna (@LibbyMegna) July 29, 2017 Second post with an update on how to add tip shapes and colours to ggtree https://t.
